purpose: Classify eigenmodes of the Z6-character operators A_m by defect localization and by spin/phase correlation; provide a mode catalog usable for sector-mixed Hamiltonian H(λ)=A_m⊗I4 + λ I⊗C4.

metrics.defect_energy_frac: sum_{delta4 edges} |psi[v]-omega^s psi[u]|^2 / sum_{all edges} same
metrics.aligned_corr: choose global phase to maximize alignment with feature direction and correlate real part with feature

key_findings: Strongest spin/phase-carrying modes are the top eigenvectors in m=2 and m=3, with corr_sigma≈0.80-0.84 and corr_sumph≈0.77-0.85.
Defect-localized modes exist in multiple m sectors; m=3 contains the highest concentration of defect-localized modes under the threshold defect_mass>0.20.

Because sector-mixing adds ±λ slopes, eigenvalue ordering across λ is dominated by the symmetric (+3λ) branch at large λ; the catalog provides tags to interpret which base modes populate which branches.
